name: Hennessy Ginger
preparation:
This simple mix of Hennessy and ginger ale is perfect for any hour. Pour one for yourself to experience how the spice of the ginger ale brings out the natural spice in Hennessy V.S.

Pour cognac into a double Old Fashioned glass.

Add ice cubes until glass is filled.

Top with ginger ale.

Garnish with a lime wedge and skewered fresh slices of ginger.
